ch.nolix.system.application

Class AlphaServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.nolix.common.module.Module
      • ch.nolix.system.application.AlphaServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILevel1Controller, ILevel2Controller, ILevel3Controller, CodeNamed

    public final class AlphaServer
extends Module
    An alpha server contains applications and listens to clients on a specific port.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AlphaServer(CentralController centralController, int port)
      Creates new alpha server that belongs to the given central contorller and listens to clients on the given port.
